meanings.sent1: The orbiculate table was perfect for our small kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The moon looked orbiculate in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The orbiculate pizza was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as orbiculate as a full moon.
meanings.sent5: The orbiculate coin rolled smoothly on the table.

meanings.definition: To make something circular in shape.
meanings.sent1: She orbiculated the dough to form perfect cookies.
meanings.sent2: The potter orbiculated the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent3: He orbiculated the pancake batter with skillful precision.
meanings.sent4: The dancer orbiculated gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor orbiculated the marble into a stunning sculpture.
